document.full_text: chicago blackhawks star patrick kane made a little boy's summer last year, by unexpectedly showing at his birthday party. matt cannon, 10, recently returned the favor, giving kane a very important puck.
document.title: kane gets a championship puck, from a 10-year-old
lines_and_colors: chicago blackhawks star patrick kane made a little boy's summer last year, by unexpectedly showing at his birthday party. matt cannon, 10, recently returned the favor, giving kane a very important puck.
